```{r}
library(devtools)
library(Rcpp) # have to load this BEFORE ohicore
#install_github('ohi-science/ohicore')
library(ohicore)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

# ohi-core raw data is now installed in my home directory; too big to put on github 
meancatch <-read.csv("ohi-global-2017.1/eez/layers/fis_meancatch.csv", stringsAsFactors = F)

salmon <- meancatch %>%
  filter(stock_id_taxonkey =="Salmonidae-61_400076")


## Working on ggplot2
salmon_plot <- ggplot(salmon, aes(year,meancatch))+
  geom_line()
```
